definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]

sentences.english: There is also a Children's Corner in our zoo.
sentences.chinese: 動物園裏還有個兒童樂園。

sentences.english: Once (he was)a worker , Pang Long now becomes a famous singer.
sentences.chinese: 龐龍曾經是個工人，現在變成一位著名的歌手。

sentences.english: In most cases, it is a good idea to include them.
sentences.chinese: 大部分情況下，把教育時間寫進去是個好主意。

sentences.english: It turns out that you can be a committed nurse and have a social life.
sentences.chinese: 因爲那可以證明你可以是個有社交生活的帶罪護士。

sentences.english: 'And it's a better hiding-place than out here in the country.
sentences.chinese: 那兒是個比鄉間更好的藏身的地方。
“莫里森是個很棒的球員，”布朗說。

sentences.english: We don't have any information from inside the plant.
sentences.chinese: 我們還沒有任何來自核電站裏面的消息，這是個問題。

sentences.english: He now lives in Germany with his wife Deling and their 2 children.
sentences.chinese: 他與太太得靈及他們的2個孩子目前旅居在德國。

sentences.english: The gunman notched up five victims on the handle of his gun.
sentences.chinese: 槍手在自己的槍柄上刻上5個受害者的記號。

sentences.english: I am a European, and one returns to one's roots .
sentences.chinese: 我是個歐洲人，總要葉落歸根。

sentences.english: For Clarissa, the entree is just the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 對克拉麗莎來說，主菜只是是個開頭。

sentences.english: Tom's friend said he was a double-tongued liar.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆的朋友說他是個兩面三刀的騙子。

sentences.english: One in 3 domestic passengers chooses China Southern Airlines on average.
sentences.chinese: 中國平均每3個民航旅客就有1個選擇南航。

sentences.english: One in 3 domestic passengers chooses China Southern Airlines on average.
sentences.chinese: 中國平均每3個民航旅客就有1個選擇南航。

definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
